arabicText: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
Most	Auspicious	is	He	in	Whose	control	is	
the	entire	kingship;	and	He	is	Able	to	do	all	
things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Badi	barkat	wāla	hai	woh	jiske qabze	meiñ	
sāra	mulk	aur	woh	har	cheez	par	qādir	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًۭا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
englishTranslationText:
The	One	Who	created	death	and	life	to	test	
you	-	who	among	you	has	the	better	deeds;	
and	He	only	is	the	Most	Honourable,	the	
Oft	Forgiving.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jis	ne	maut	aur	zindagi	paida	ki	ke	
tumhāri	jāñch	ho	tum	meiñ	kis	ka	kām	
ziyada	achchha	hai	aur	wohi	‘izzat	wāla	
bakhshish	wāla	hai.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍۢ طِبَاقًۭا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍۢ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	One	Who	created	the	seven	heavens	
atop	each	other;	do	you	see	any	
discrepancy	in	the	creation	of	the	Most	
Gracious?	Therefore	lift	your	gaze	–	do	you	
see	any	cracks?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jisne	sāt	āasmān	banaye	ek	ke	upar	doosra	
to	Rahmān	ke	banāne	meiñ	kya	farq	dekhta	
hai?	to	nigah	utha	kar	dekh	tujhe	koi	
rukhna (Kharābi	wa	‘aib) 	nazar	āata	hai?
